review: Very nice and humble doctor. Knows the real pulse of how to handle children. Very true to his profession.

review: ********* ******* Visited for 15 month old infant. Explained every thing in layman language and gave enough time to examine my son. Very down to earth and gave proper medicine. My son is in recovering stage. Would recommend him.
I was very relieved after visiting Dr Jatin for my daughter's illness as she had prolonged diarrhea that got better after his treatment. I have been visiting him since her birth .
Have been visiting Dr. Jatin for a long time for my two children age 2 and 4.  Both of them recieved all vaccines from him. I would highly recommend him.
Nice doctor.it was first time visit for getting a medical fitness certificate required during school admission
